name: Favela Fabric
tag_list: social-business, enterprise-2-0, social-network-analysis, customer-engagement, employee-engagement, social-capital, co-creation, crowdsourcing, ideation, social-intelligence, social-branding
overview:
Favela Fabric provides social business consultancy and services to medium-large size organizations. Favela Fabric creates value and unlocks social capital - knowledge, creativity, information - by durably engaging employees, partners and customers in their business.

Over 40 social business and dialogue experts, community managers, co-creation designers and a social tech-team assist companies transforming into networked, adaptive organizations in valuable dialogue with their stakeholders.

Favela Fabric is thought leader and the most experienced full-service provider in Europe. Business areas: customer & channel conversations, open-innovation, social knowledge & change.

4 P-methodology: combining

  • People - excellent team and known target group;
  • Program - theme-selection, content production, acquisition and activation;
  • Process - from preparation, dialogue management, enrichment of insights and ideas to follow-up and embedding;
  • Platform - social technology for maximum interaction, 24/7 and worldwide access combined with offline.

Favela enables dialogue and value creation on existing (social media, intranet e.d.) platforms or designs and develops custom-made platforms.

Additional key words: enterprise 2.0, social network analysis, learning networks, stakeholder engagement, co-creation, crowdsourcing, ideation, insight sourcing & validation (intelligence), social branding.
